definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Li Zhongming would burn up those drawings, he left home leave Yang Nian letters.
sentences.chinese: 黎仲明將那些圖紙燒燬，他臨走時給楊念留下書信。

sentences.english: Face before hiking, Qin Feng says apt her ugg boots new store starts train ugg tall builds threatening force this time.
sentences.chinese: 臨走前，秦風對她說這次新店開業要造一下聲勢。

sentences.english: Previous to her departure she gave a big party.
sentences.chinese: 在她臨走之前她舉行了一次大型宴會。

sentences.english: I finally picked out three books which were written in a style easy enough for me to understand, and I took these back to my room.
sentences.chinese: 臨走時，我還選了三本簡單易懂的帶回寢室。

sentences.english: He had said to finish the tutor to Gao Luo, come back in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 他臨走時說做完家教要找高洛去，晚上回來。

sentences.english: The guests were given a tiny jar of honey from the White House beehives to take home.
sentences.chinese: 每位客人臨走時還被贈送了一小瓶白宮自產的蜂蜜。

sentences.english: When he left he cut short the father's nervous thanks gruffly.
sentences.chinese: 臨走時，他很粗魯地打斷了那父親的緊張的道謝的話。

sentences.english: His last thought on leaving home was for her.
sentences.chinese: 他離家的時候，臨走想到的還是她。

sentences.english: And he told me I could go to the canteen to get paste, he had arranged well with the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 臨走時說，糨子到伙房去打，他已經跟炊事員說好了。

sentences.english: When he left, liu town told him, when he and his friendship to the end.
sentences.chinese: 臨走時，柳時鎮告訴他，自己和他的友情到此結束。
臨走時，我的印象很深刻。

sentences.english: There is a being who carried off my sky when she went away.
sentences.chinese: 有個人臨走時把天帶走了。

sentences.english: The time faced to walk, he still remembers to be personally needling up a lotus light in front of door.
sentences.chinese: 臨走的時候，他還記得在親手在門前掛上一盞蓮花燈。

sentences.english: But before he left, Summerville accused Nora of leading him on, and swore vengeance.
sentences.chinese: 索姆威勒臨走前，抱怨勞拉誆騙了他，併發誓要報復。

sentences.english: Just before leaving, I and several good friends took a souvenir photo under the oriental pearl tower.
sentences.chinese: 臨走時，我和幾個好朋友們在東方明珠塔下留了影。

sentences.english: Before I left, Mr. Xie did not disproportionately expressed their preferences.
sentences.chinese: 臨走前，謝先生並沒有過多地表示出自己的喜好。
